message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $250.
I'm really interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $150.
I understand that $150 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $200. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $200. Would you be willing to go a bit lower, to $180? I really think this product would be a great fit for me.

I'm glad you're interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you at $190, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $190. Would you be willing to meet me at $185?

I'm starting to think we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $187.50, but that's as low as I can go. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $180. Would you be willing to meet me at $182?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $185, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $180?
I've reached my limit, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $182. It's the best I can do. If you're not comfortable with that, I'm happy to discuss further, but I won't go below that price.
